Uses of Package
org.apache.accumulo.core.client.summary

  • Packages that use org.apache.accumulo.core.client.summary 
    Package Description
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.admin  
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.mapred  
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.rfile  
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.summary  
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.summary.summarizers  
  • Classes in org.apache.accumulo.core.client.summary used by org.apache.accumulo.core.client.admin 
    Class and Description
    SummarizerConfiguration
    This class encapsulates the configuration needed to instantiate a Summarizer.
    Summary
    This class encapsulates summary statistics, information about how those statistics were generated, and information about files the statistics were obtained from.
  • Classes in org.apache.accumulo.core.client.summary used by org.apache.accumulo.core.client.mapred 
    Class and Description
    SummarizerConfiguration
    This class encapsulates the configuration needed to instantiate a Summarizer.
  • Classes in org.apache.accumulo.core.client.summary used by org.apache.accumulo.core.client.rfile 
    Class and Description
    SummarizerConfiguration
    This class encapsulates the configuration needed to instantiate a Summarizer.
    Summary
    This class encapsulates summary statistics, information about how those statistics were generated, and information about files the statistics were obtained from.
  • Classes in org.apache.accumulo.core.client.summary used by org.apache.accumulo.core.client.summary 
    Class and Description
    CountingSummarizer.Converter
    A function that converts key values to zero or more counter objects.
    Summarizer
    Instances of this interface can be configured for Accumulo tables.
    Summarizer.Collector
    When Accumulo calls methods in this interface, it will call Summarizer.Collector.accept(Key, Value) zero or more times and then call Summarizer.Collector.summarize(Summarizer.StatisticConsumer) once.
    Summarizer.Combiner
    A Combiner is used to merge statistics emitted from Summarizer.Collector.summarize(Summarizer.StatisticConsumer) and from previous invocations of itself.
    Summarizer.StatisticConsumer 
    SummarizerConfiguration
    This class encapsulates the configuration needed to instantiate a Summarizer.
    SummarizerConfiguration.Builder 
    Summary
    This class encapsulates summary statistics, information about how those statistics were generated, and information about files the statistics were obtained from.
    Summary.FileStatistics 
  • Classes in org.apache.accumulo.core.client.summary used by org.apache.accumulo.core.client.summary.summarizers 
    Class and Description
    CountingSummarizer
    This class counts arbitrary keys while defending against too many keys and keys that are too long.
    CountingSummarizer.Converter
    A function that converts key values to zero or more counter objects.
    Summarizer
    Instances of this interface can be configured for Accumulo tables.
    Summarizer.Collector
    When Accumulo calls methods in this interface, it will call Summarizer.Collector.accept(Key, Value) zero or more times and then call Summarizer.Collector.summarize(Summarizer.StatisticConsumer) once.
    Summarizer.Combiner
    A Combiner is used to merge statistics emitted from Summarizer.Collector.summarize(Summarizer.StatisticConsumer) and from previous invocations of itself.
    SummarizerConfiguration
    This class encapsulates the configuration needed to instantiate a Summarizer.
